verbose_text: Given the activation of type 2 inflammation by Raptor deficiency in iWAT (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY, XREF_FIG, and XREF_FIG), further investigation is needed to address whether COX-2 mediates the promoting effect of mTORC1 inhibition on immune response in the context of thermogenic regulation.
evidence: COX-2 mediates the promoting effect of mTORC1
